mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CONTRACT ( ID, CONTRACT_NAME, FILE_URI, MD5, ) VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=Long}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, )
